<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> DLC </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value> <comment><!-- unkown --></comment>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if the DLC is marked as available. (Steam)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[isDLCAvailable]] appid

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> appid : [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> _Karts = 288520;
[[isDLCAvailable]] _Karts;//Returns true </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getDLCs]], [[getObjectDLC]], [[getPersonUsedDLCs]], [[getMissionDLCs]]
</value></part></template>

<dd class="note">appid can be taken from Steam DLC url.

*Zeus url is <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>http://store.</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>steampowered.com/app/'''275700'''/
